title: DreamCTL Task Router Plugin
description: Implement a router plugin for the dreamctl CLI to claim, complete, and release tasks interactively via subcommands with JSON output support.
benefits: Eliminate manual JSON file editing for task management
Provide immediate CLI feedback on task actions
tasks: Design plugin command architecture and usage patterns
Implement `router` subcommands: claim, complete, release, list
Add JSON and human-readable output modes
Write unit tests and update CLI documentation
